name: Quick Bread Mix
author: Helen Hanson
summary: Bulk mix suitable for quick breads and/or muffins. These are great baked in mini pans for an assortment on trays for gifts. I also bake a lot for fall bake sales. Three cups of mix makes one large or two medium loaves. Add 1 cup pureed cooked vegetable or fruit such as pumpkin, winter squash, carrots, apricots, applesauce, mashed banana along with whatever nuts, fruits or flavorings you desire.
directions: Mix thoroughly flour, sugar, baking powder, soda, and salt
(Can be stored on the shelf for months
) Mix 3 cups baking mix, oil, eggs, and 1 cup vegetables or fruits
Add flavorings, nuts, raisins, dates, etc
Pour into one 8-1/2x4-1/2 inch or two 7-1/4x3-1/2 inch greased loaf pans
Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 30 to 45 minutes
